name: Buck Brothers' 'South West Prospect of Manchester' (1728)
description: Panoramic engraved prospect of Manchester by Samuel and Nathaniel Buck. Part of their series of 83 prospects of cities and capital towns of England and Wales (1728-53).
notes:
Samuel and Nathaniel Buck, 'South West Prospect of Manchester on the County Palatine of Lancaster' (1728).
Part of 83 prospects series of English/Welsh cities (1728-1753).
Chetham's Library holds a copy (101 Treasures collection).
Shows the town skyline from the south-west, pre-industrial Manchester.
Also available as prints: see meisterdrucke.uk and Altea Gallery listings.
Not a map per se but a key topographical view.
